TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PeerCustomResolverSettings extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含自定义对等解析程序服务的实例的特定设置。

span.span: Contains the specific settings for an instance of a custom peer resolver service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型可定义自定义对等解析程序服务的基本设置，其中包括执行服务的对等解析程序的终结点地址和所有特定绑定设置。This type defines the basic settings for a custom peer resolver service, including the endpoint address of the peer hosting the service and any specific binding settings. 通常，这些设置是提供给 属性的。These settings are typically provided to the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义对等解析程序服务所在的对等节点的终结点地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the endpoint address of the peer node hosting the custom peer resolver service.

span.span: that contains the endpoint address of the peer node running the custom peer resolver service.

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义对等解析程序服务所使用的通道绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the channel binding used by the custom peer resolver service.
that contains the binding settings for this service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此绑定元素可提供在客户端上绑定通道工厂和在服务上绑定通道侦听器的规范。This binding element provides the specification for building a channel factory on the client and a channel listener on the service. 此通道工厂可用于为自定义对等解析程序服务生成通道。This channel factory is used to produce channels for the custom peer resolver service.
